mapper.select: select identity, title, contnet, created, view, author, user from board_notice
mapper.insert: insert into board_notice(identity, title, contnet, created, view, author, user) values (MVC_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{bname},#{btitle},#{bcontent},0)
mapper.select: select bid, bname, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bhit from mvc_board where bid=#{bid}
mapper.update: update mvc_board set bname = #{bname}, btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent} where bid=#{bid}
